title: Direct Knowledge
text:
Direct Knowledge
    
        Learn faster, explore deeper
    
    
        
            Learn mathematics and computer science from anywhere in the world.
            Instead of buttons on a calculator, learn mathematics and how to code.
            Get step-by-step explanations with interactive, programmable tutorials.
            Watch, listen, and receive instant feedback with videos and live streams.
        
    
    
        Get Started
        About
    
    
      
        
      
    
  




Education sure has come along ways
Direct Knowledge brings technology together so you can learn faster.






    Learn. Progress. Explore deeper with Direct Knowledge.
    Get Started

title: About
text: Direct Knowledge is a company founded by David A. Smith, a retired mathematics professor with over 15 years of experience educating students at the University of Texas at Arlington. David is passionate about learning both mathematics and computer science, and advancing knowledge in these areas. His mission is to make it accessible for people everywhere to learn in these subjects, whenever they want, and however they want. We are doing this by building the world’s first online education platform that offers everyone free access to expert-led courses using articles, videos, and especially, interactive tutorials and live streaming.
